paper_abstract: An h-type index is proposed which depends on the obtained citations of articles belonging to the h-core. This weighted h-index, denoted as h., is presented in a continuous setting and in a discrete one. It is shown that in a continuous setting the new index enjoys many good properties. In the discrete setting some small deviations from the ideal may occur. (c) 2007 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: An h-index weighted by citation impact
